name: latest_price
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool osrs_live_prices.
Tool description: Grand exchange data for old school runescape items. 
API description: Fetches the latest price for the given item ID and timestep from the OSRS Live Prices API.

timestep.description: The timestep for which to retrieve the latest price.

itemid.description: The ID of the item for which to fetch the latest price.
